alert.note: Alert for Delta; Fannin; Hopkins; Hunt; Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 12:14PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Hunt, northern Hopkins, Lamar, Delta and southeastern Fannin Counties through 100 PM CDT... At 1212 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Honey Grove, or 16 miles southwest of Paris, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paris, Sulphur Springs, Commerce, Cooper, Honey Grove, Blossom, Wolfe City, Deport, Cooper Lake Park South Sulphur, Cooper Lake Park Doctors Creek, Roxton, Ladonia, Tira, Pecan Gap, Windom, Toco and Sun Valley. This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 127 and 142. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for north central Texas.
